tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to incline to; by implication (literally but rarely) to bend; figuratively, to be pleased with, desire

tokens.resolved_gloss: (in the plural only) the kidneys (as being covered); hence (figuratively) the inmost thought

tokens.resolved_gloss: to stop up; by implication, to repair; figuratively, to keep secret

tokens.resolved_gloss: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
